edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.feat

Interface RichIncrementalFeaturizer<TK,FV>

    • Method Detail

      • dump

        void dump(Featurizable<TK,FV> f)
        Dump internal state of Featurizer, which is constructed using featurizable f.

      • rerankingMode

        void rerankingMode(boolean r)
        Tells the Featurizer whether decoding is complete or not. If decoding is complete, the Featurizer might generate features that are too expensive to compute during beam search, which one may want to keep for rescoring the n-best list (warning: if you ever rely on this feature, make sure that n-best list generation is always turned on with the same n value, even during test-time decoding).
